reviewText: Simply put: if you're a fan of the show, you are going to like this DVD.  And if you haven't seen it yet, this is a good way to check it out!  The only downside is: it doesn't have the entire season, only 7 episodes.  BUT it does include an A&E special from a few years ago, which is cool to see because Beth and Dog looked kind of different - it was one of my favorite things on the DVD.  A good buy!
Title: N/A

reviewText: It's cheesy and sometimes a little sleazy, but it's a lot of fun!  This is a great series that my wife and I watch each Tuesday night on A & E.  For some reason, the stories of the Chapmans' have captured our imaginations and we have a blast with this show!  These are great episodes chosen by Duane "Dog" Chapman himself.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This has the pilot episode.  It's fun to see the original Dog and Alice.  I recommend this series because it is less produced and more honest.
summary: This has the pilot episode.  It's fun to see the original Dog and Alice.
Title: N/A

reviewText: hands down the BEST SHOW ON T.V., dog and his "family" are the most entertaining people on the tube. this mix of cop show and everyday life of dog and family gives you more than a little excitement,it shows you a family taht fights,yells,and other wise gets on each others nerves, but they come together in times of need and they always look out for each other no matter what. they even take pity on the people they bring in to jail. i really can't say why, but i never miss this show and was happy to find it on dvd.
summary: this dog hunts,so don't get caught in his sights
Title: N/A

reviewText: I love bounty hunting. Any show like this i like.  I want eventually to get all the seasons downloaded.  Dog is the best bounty hunter in the world.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This Dvd attempts to make Dog Chapman out to be a hero fighting crime but too bad he bails all these criminals out of jail before he "captures" them. Hey, Dog you know these street punks are career criminals so stop bailing them out and allowing them to harm society on your dime.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This Series was very good. I wish that it was still on TV and am so glad that it is on DVD. Worth the buy.
